summary: A biography of the American rock band The Beach Boys, with interviews, concert footage and clips from movies and television shows they appeared in.
cast: Brian Wilson|Dennis Wilson|Carl Wilson|Mike Love|Al Jardine|Bruce Johnston|The Beach Boys|Jack Benny|Bobby Figueroa|Jimi Hendrix|Bob Hope|Karen Lamm|Paul McCartney|Van Dyke Parks|Banana Wilson|Louie Wilson|Dan Aykroyd|John Belushi|Harry Nilsson
title: The Beach Boys: An American Band
